title: GURUPRASAD KUNJ
detail: Guruprasad Kunj presents a selection of exquisite 4 and 5 BHK residences designed for luxury and comfort. Each home is thoughtfully crafted to provide spacious living areas, elegant interiors, and high-end finishes. Enjoy modern amenities such as contemporary kitchens, premium flooring, and advanced climate control systems. With expansive layouts and private outdoor spaces, Guruprasad Kunj offers a serene retreat while staying connected to vibrant community life. Experience a blend of sophistication and convenience in every corner of these distinguished residences.
developer_detail: Kotibhaskar Infrastructures, founded in 1982 by Mr. Chidambar Shivanand Kotibhaskar and Mr. Dilip Shivanand Kotibhaskar, began its journey in Sangli and expanded to Pune and Hubli. The company has earned a stellar reputation for its transparent operations and commitment to quality. Their focus on building lasting relationships with customers, suppliers, and financiers while maintaining high ethical standards has been a key to their success. Kotibhaskar Infrastructures prioritizes safeguarding customer investments even after project completion.
city_description: Kiwale-Mamurdi Road represents the perfect blend of modernity and convenience, making it an ideal choice for real estate investments. Whether you are looking for a place to call home or seeking a lucrative commercial venture, this location offers unparalleled opportunities for growth and prosperity. Invest in Kiwale-Mamurdi Road today and be part of a thriving future.
